name: And Another Door Bites the Dust
name_original: And Another Door Bites the Dust
description:
How to play:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move, mouse to click menu buttons
  • Gather enough keys to move to the next level; Additional keys are converted to health
  • When you open a door, another door will be sealed shut, becoming a wall
  • You can break down walls at the cost of health
  • Using a super PSY will allow you to absorb enemies for a period of time
